tool_description: Games and pre-game Odds for Betano
title: Betano

api_list.name: Odds - Soccer
api_list.description: Latest Odds by Betano - Soccer.  Updated every 6 hours
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://betano.p.rapidapi.com/odds/soccer/betano"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "betano.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
